title: pack, linker: consider changing name of __.SYMDEF in .a files
body:
The current .a files generated by go pack have an entry named __.SYMDEF.  However, the
format of this entry is not the same as the format described in the ELF standard, nor is
it the format used by the older BSD ranlib program.  The effect is that the GNU ar
program, as found on GNU/Linux and other systems, can not be used to examine the
contents of the .a file.

This could be easily fixed by simply renaming __.SYMDEF to something else, as GNU ar and
other programs recognize the entry by name.
